 I had lower astrals just this morning! I saw myself in astral form as my =
ghost friends see me, for the first time. Looking down----at -them!
 
 Fran=
k-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec=
 2007 20:27:33 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: MiniBox - General Recommendation=
s




Hi Ann,Just jumping in to add my two cents. I personally don't like t=
o focus on evil entities, even though I believe 100% that lower astrals exi=
st. Not only that, Tibetan shamans, among others, have repeatedly shown tha=
t thought forms can be given form and a measure of life. The way I see it, =
if we keep a higher focus, such things as rage, hate, and destruction among=
 other things will be far removed. Ouija Boards have many times been the so=
urce of horrible experiences. Just from listening to all the hundreds of ca=
llers on C2C over the years, I'd say over 95% of the stories weren't good. =
George did make a good statement to the effect that it's not good giving a =
loaded gun to a child. Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, lisby@... wrote=
:>> He may very well have changed it. Maybe he'll tell us why himself, if h=
e chooses, since he's a list member.> > Can I ask you what personal experie=
nces you have had with evil entities that make you so concerned? Not other =
people's alledged experiences, but your own? I'm really curious. It's not a=
 trap of any kind.> > Ann> > -----Original Message-----> >From: babiarz3 <b=
abiarz3@...>> >Sent: Dec 3, 2007 6:35 AM> >To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> >Su=
bject: [EVP-ITC] Re: MiniBox - General Recommendations> >> >Not misinformat=
ion. The page has been changed as of Dec 3rd! Imagine> >that. The article d=
id indeed state that children and high school> >students would be part of t=
he testing groups as well as skeptic,> >believers, etc. > >Yes I did notice=
 the discrepancy between the asup article and the> >disclaimers on the para=
normal sytems page. > >> >> >--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@>=
 wrote:> >>> >> Well, so much for the "Oh Noes!1!! What abouts the childern=
!!??!1" > >> misinformation.> >> > >> Ann> >> > >> > >> On Dec 3, 2007, at =
3:19 AM, Lance Oliver wrote:> >> > >> > I pulled this list of general recom=
mendations for The MiniBox right> >> > off Ron's www.paranormalsystems.com =
page -> >> >> >> > 1. Do not allow children under the age of 16 to use this=
 device> >> >> >> > 2. Although individual sessions are effective, group se=
ssions are more> >> > productive.> >> >> >> > 3. This is not an 'electronic=
 Ouija board' - no harm can come from> >> > using it.> >> >> >> > 4. Some v=
oices will use coarse language so be prepared for it.> >> >> >> > 5. Always=
 use a recorder to tape all sessions> >> >> >> > 6. Keep a notebook with th=
e times and locations of your sessions.> >> >> >> > 7. The MiniBox will cal=
l you by name so don't be startled by it.> >> >> >> > Lance> >> >> >> >> >>=
 >> >>> >> >>

in astral form as my ghost friends see me, for the first time. Looking down=
----at -them!<BR>
 <BR>
 Frank-S<BR><BR><BR>
